overview: A crook sets out to get revenge on the thugs who hurt his father in this bloody noir-style crime drama. After being released from prison, Johnny Crown (Denis Leary) goes after Frank (Joe Mantegna), one of the mobsters involved in a series of Father's Day killings. But Johnny isn't certain Frank is responsible for his father's injuries and seeks help from a sex therapist (Annabella Sciorra) to make sure he's got the right man.
tagline: Sometimes revenge is the best therapy.
cast: Denis Leary|Joe Mantegna|Annabella Sciorra|Larry Bishop|Abe Vigoda
